name: Boss Run (maticlahajnar)
description:
Beat yourself in this infinite roguelike game. Collect the most points, reach the farthest room, collect food, defeat enemies and climb on top.

In this game you fight monsters and bosses to progress to the next level. Use your skills to avoid taking damage and do the best Boss Run.

Gameteam presents 
BossRun
Featuring Matic Lahajnar et al 
Done with Monogame framework
Done within TINR course taught by Bojan Klemenc & Peter Peer 
Computer Vision Lab
Faculty of Computer and Information Science 
University of Ljubljana 
Slovenia
2019
